snippet: Erin DiMeglio, a 17-year-old senior at South Plantation High School, is believed to be the first girl to play quarterback in a Florida high school football game.
abstract: Profile of Erin DiMeglio, 17-year-old senior at South Plantation High School who is a backup quarterback on the football team; she is believed to be the first girl to play quarterback in a Florida high school football game.
lead_paragraph: Erin DiMeglio, a 17-year-old senior at South Plantation High School, is believed to be the first girl to play quarterback in a Florida high school football game.

headline.seo: Girl Is Pioneer at Quarterback for Florida High School
headline.main: To the Boys, Her Role Is Simple: Teammate
headline.print_headline: To the Boys, Her Role Is Simple: Teammate
